input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
A Chaya Plant in a Six Inch Pot

Product specifications:
A single new Emeritus Gardens Chaya rooted cutting shipped in a Six inch pot.
Emeritus Gardens Plant Food is included so that Chaya roots develop quickly and plants can be planted out quickly.
Ideal vegetable .for highly nutritious soups and stews. Emeritus Gardens Care sheet is included.
Vitamin and iron content exceeds that of Spinach plants.
Grow in warm sunny southern gardens or indoors in the North.
Shippped BARE ROOTED to California.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Here's a plant that's sure to generate a lot of attention, interest, and desire. A chaya plant is a fast growing, perennial tree/shrub with edible leaves that can be used to make a delicious soup. It's high iron and vitamin content mean it's extremely nutritious. A six inch pot is a very small size, so this plant is very easy to acquire and grow (action). It's shipped bare rooted, which is the most economical way to ship a potted plant. It's ideal for growing in warm climates, but in northern climates it can be grown indoors.
input_text.Response B: Chaya is a fast-growing tropical plant that is packed with nutrients - it's a great source of vitamin A, vitamin C, and iron. It's also a versatile ingredient in many recipes, as the leaves and stems can be used in soups, stews, and salads. With the Emeritus Gardens Chaya rooted cutting, you can grow your own Chaya plant in your own home or garden. The plant is shipped in a six-inch pot, so it's easy to plant and care for. Plus, Emeritus Gardens Plant Food is included, so your Chaya plant will grow quickly and strongly. You'll also receive a care sheet with tips on how to grow and maintain your Chaya plant. This is a great way to add a nutritious and flavorful ingredient to your cooking and to enjoy the benefits of growing your own food.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
